alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 3:18AM EST until January 09 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast to south winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts 50 to 60 mph this morning, becoming southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph this afternoon. * WHERE...Coastal Wakulla County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 1 PM EST this afternoon. For the Wind Advisory, from 1 PM this afternoon to 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
